sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import {
  Box,
  Button,
  Card,
  Container,
  FormControl,
  FormLabel,
  FormErrorMessage,
  FormHelperText,
  Heading,
  Input,
  InputGroup,
  InputLeftElement,
  NumberInput,
  NumberInputField,
  NumberInputStepper,
  NumberIncrementStepper,
  NumberDecrementStepper,
  Select,
  Textarea
} from '@chakra-ui/react'

const ExpenseForm = () => {
  return(
    // <Container>
      <Card p={2}>
        <Heading size='md' as='h2' colorScheme='red'>Expense Form.</Heading>
        <FormControl isRequired>
          <FormLabel>Entity</FormLabel>
          <Select placeholder='Select Entity'>
            <option>Alice</option>
            <option>Damaris</option>
            <option>Joanna</option>
          </Select>
          <FormLabel>Vendor</FormLabel>
          <Input type='text' />
          <FormLabel>Product</FormLabel>
          <Input type='text' />
          <FormHelperText>Where did you create this expense.</FormHelperText>
          <FormLabel>Amount</FormLabel>
          <NumberInput max={999} min={2}>
            <InputGroup>
              <InputLeftElement
                pointerEvents='none'
                color='gray.300'
                fontSize='1.2em'
              >$
              </InputLeftElement>
              <NumberInputField paddingLeft={4}/>
              <NumberInputStepper>
                <NumberIncrementStepper />
                <NumberDecrementStepper />
              </NumberInputStepper>
            </InputGroup>
            </NumberInput>
            <FormLabel>Describe the expenses.</FormLabel>
            <Textarea placeholder='Describe the expense and why it was purchased.' />
            <Button
              //isLoading
              loadingText='Submitting'
              colorScheme='pink'
              variant='outline'
              mt={2}
            >
              Submit
          </Button>
        </FormControl>
      </Card>
    // </Container>
  )
}

export default ExpenseForm
